titleStmt.title: Peace at Pinners-Hall wish'd, and attempted in a pacifick paper touching the universality of redemption, the conditionality of the covenant of grace, and our freedom from the law of works upon occasion of a sermon ... / by a lover of truth and accommodation.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Humfrey. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
